Articles.Content:
WOO! SOLID GOLD TORTILLA CHIPS!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! WOO!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

the object to you Right is now a Bar of Diamond

War and peace yaaaa

the object up over your computer is now a wall

OH GOD MY LEGS AHHHHH(its a small laptop which i angle in my lap)

the object to your left is now a walrus

TO VICTORY TREADMILL WALRUS!

The Object to your Right is suddenly an Alien

you are recieving this message in alien.

the next object you see is the lie

The cake is a lie

the next thing that touches you is now a meme

OH NO CHAIR MEMES CHAIR MEMES EVERYWHERE!

The thing 1 mile up 2 miles down and 3 miles to the right is now the theme for the Next summer blockbuster

a mile down into the ground is just...dirt, I guess. In all direction.

The object to your nadir just got it's gravity flipped.

A air moulicule huh

the object to your right is now your under garments

So Soda can Undergarments? Suprisingly Comfy...

The Next object that makes a sound in your house is suddenly a Super advanced Alien Trying to make contact (Btw it has to be OUTside of the room you are in)

Huh, I wonder if my cell phone underwear will get a good signal...

The object to your left becomes your only food source!

A cat (insert contrivercile joke here)

it cAn catch food for me

Alrighty then.

The object diagonally-left-of-but-behind you gains internet connectivity.

A poster of Einstein?

the object to your right is now green iron crown

the next object you see that is atleast 3 miles away from your house is suddenly the theme for the next best video game ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

i dont see anything for a quarter mile. then i hit the horizon.

the next object you see to your right is your brand new iPhone

science night Poster Iphone!

object to (spin) is now exploding in your intestines

A ham sandwich is that bad or good?

the thing behind your computer is now a pillow
Glass pillow? Does not sound very comfortable... The next object To your (Jump and spin 3 times) is now a hamburger.

Cool my text book is now a hamburger.....now I can eat my homework.....AWSOME!

the object 3 paces behind you is now in love with you......very in love with you
NO TABLE BACK OFF NOOOOOO! The Object on the Next floor up or down in your house is now suddenly the newest KSP part

Air! Amazing prediction!

The object that you last glued together is now a pony. An angry pony.

A poster board when I was still in middle school 

the next thing you ingest then digest will become your next piece pie

Well.. I guess Mango Pie is delicious.

The object that your feet are on will be your blanket for a year.

My pants or my desk?

the next building you see is your rocket ship
